title: Sewing Machine’s Love Story - Novel Updates
tags: Adapted to Drama CD   Boss-Subordinate Relationship   Calm Protagonist   Contracts   Different Social Status   Handsome Male Lead   Hard-Working Protagonist   Heartwarming   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Misunderstandings   Older Love Interests   Pragmatic Protagonist   Pretend Lovers   Short Story   Straight Seme   Tsundere   Wealthy Characters
author: Jing Shui Bian   木更木更   静水边
description:
Xu Nian’s mother was sick, and as they were a normal single income family, they used up all their money to pay for her hospital fees. It wasn’t enough. Xu Nian was a young, good-looking but also very poor university student who was trying to look for a way out.

Cheng Chen was a domineering CEO. He just dumped a lover, and is looking for a new one…and this time he wants a male one.

They meet, and fit each other’s needs quite well. And as the cliched script goes, they enter into a give and take relationship–no love or feelings involved.

But…

Who knew that the domineering CEO had such a cute habit!

Note: The titular Sewing Machine, is referring to the ML, Cheng Chen because of his leg shaking habit. The shaking is kind of like a sewing machine’s needle going up and down, up and down.>
